member.name: T:Xarial.XCad.SolidWorks.Documents.Services.SwDocumentDispatcher
member.summary: This services dispatches the model docs and creates SwDocument objects
member.remarks: This service is also responsible to using the objects pre-created templates wheer applicable instead of creating new ones. DocumentLoadNotify2 even is fired async so it is not ensured that it is raised before or after OpenDoc6 or NewDocument APIs. This services is respnsibel for handlign the race conditions

member.name: F:Xarial.XCad.SolidWorks.UI.WinAPI.RedrawWindowFlags.Invalidate
member.summary: Invalidates the rectangle or region that you specify in lprcUpdate or hrgnUpdate. You can set only one of these parameters to a non-NULL value. If both are NULL, RDW_INVALIDATE invalidates the entire window.

member.name: F:Xarial.XCad.SolidWorks.UI.WinAPI.RedrawWindowFlags.InternalPaint
member.summary: Causes the OS to post a WM_PAINT message to the window regardless of whether a portion of the window is invalid.

member.name: F:Xarial.XCad.SolidWorks.UI.WinAPI.RedrawWindowFlags.Erase
member.summary: Causes the window to receive a WM_ERASEBKGND message when the window is repainted. Specify this value in combination with the RDW_INVALIDATE value; otherwise, RDW_ERASE has no effect.

member.name: F:Xarial.XCad.SolidWorks.UI.WinAPI.RedrawWindowFlags.Validate
member.summary: Validates the rectangle or region that you specify in lprcUpdate or hrgnUpdate. You can set only one of these parameters to a non-NULL value. If both are NULL, RDW_VALIDATE validates the entire window. This value does not affect internal WM_PAINT messages.

member.name: F:Xarial.XCad.SolidWorks.UI.WinAPI.RedrawWindowFlags.NoErase
member.summary: Suppresses any pending WM_ERASEBKGND messages.

member.name: F:Xarial.XCad.SolidWorks.UI.WinAPI.RedrawWindowFlags.NoChildren
member.summary: Excludes child windows, if any, from the repainting operation.

member.name: F:Xarial.XCad.SolidWorks.UI.WinAPI.RedrawWindowFlags.AllChildren
member.summary: Includes child windows, if any, in the repainting operation.

member.name: F:Xarial.XCad.SolidWorks.UI.WinAPI.RedrawWindowFlags.UpdateNow
member.summary: Causes the affected windows, which you specify by setting the RDW_ALLCHILDREN and RDW_NOCHILDREN values, to receive WM_ERASEBKGND and WM_PAINT messages before the RedrawWindow returns, if necessary.

member.name: F:Xarial.XCad.SolidWorks.UI.WinAPI.RedrawWindowFlags.EraseNow
member.summary: Causes the affected windows, which you specify by setting the RDW_ALLCHILDREN and RDW_NOCHILDREN values, to receive WM_ERASEBKGND messages before RedrawWindow returns, if necessary. The affected windows receive WM_PAINT messages at the ordinary time.
